features.name: SineLabelShape
features.description: Adds a Sine curve label shape.

properties.name: enabled
properties.description: Enables or disables the sine wave curved widget feature.

properties.name: amplitude
properties.description: Amplitude of the sine wave (in pixels).

properties.name: periodLength
properties.description: Period length of one cycle (in pixels).

properties.name: horizontalOffset
properties.description: Horizontal offset of the sine wave.

properties.name: verticalOffset
properties.description: Vertical offset of the sine wave.

properties.name: cycleCount
properties.description: Number of cycles of the sine wave.
